q_en: Which customer orders are the cutting tasks that the Advanced Cutting Group has not yet completed?
gt:
Hey there! ğŸ˜„ It looks like I've got some information for you about the customer orders that the "Advanced Cutters" haven't completed yet. Here's what I found:

| Customer Name | Order Name  |
|---------------|-------------|
| John          | John_Pants  |

So, it seems that John has an order named "John_Pants" that the "Advanced Cutters" are still working on. If you have any more questions or need further assistance, feel free to ask! ğŸ˜Š

steps.sql: SELECT id FROM working_group WHERE name = 'Advanced Cutters';
steps.description: Retrieve the working group ID for the working group with the name "Advanced Cutters"

steps.sql: SELECT DISTINCT order_id FROM order_product WHERE id IN (6);
steps.description: Retrieve the order IDs associated with the order_product IDs from Step 2

steps.sql: SELECT c.customer_name, o.order_name FROM orders o JOIN customers c ON o.user_id = c.id WHERE o.id IN (2);
steps.description: Retrieve the customer names and order names for the orders from Step 3
